column3: Includes $45 and $597 for the years ended December 31, 2013 and 2012, respectively, for credit-related impairments; $26 and $27 for the years ended December 31, 2013 and 2012, respectively, for impairments due to severity and duration of decline in fair value; and $31, $128 and $353 for the years ended December 31, 2014, 2013 and 2012, respectively, from change in intent to sell securities
